means: 有膝一般的关节的，有节的

sentence.Network_en: Ian kneed him in the groin.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊恩用膝盖顶他的下身。

sentence.Network_en: He would need all his authority to keep the weak-kneed volunteers from bolting.
sentence.Network_cn: 他需要动用所有的职权防止那些胆小的志愿兵逃跑。

sentence.Network_en: One glance at her, and both Hurstwood and Drouet saw plainly that she also was weak - kneed.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫斯渥和杜洛埃马上看出,她和别人一样, 也吓得膝盖发软了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: kneeboss 护膝kneed 膝关节的-
knee bend 拐弯kneed 关节状的弯的
He kneed the door open ., 他用膝盖把门撞开了.
he felt on his kneed and looked at his reflection said., 他蹲下膝望着倒影说.

list.abs: a knobby - kneed boy ., 膝盖隆起的男孩.
沪江词库精选kneed是什么意思、英语单词推荐、中英文句子翻译、英语短语、英音发音... calf kneed 凹膝  kneed timber 多节材  kneed的例句:  She kneed her.
u have kneed on peach seed., 你跪在过桃壳上.
字典中软字的解释 zdic.net ... 软骨[ cartilage] 软骨头[ a weak-kneed person;a spineless person] 软管[ tube].

entry.def: Your knee is the place where your leg bends.

example.ex: He will receive physiotherapy on his damaged left knee.
example.tran: 因左膝受伤，他将接受物理治疗。

entry.def: If something or someone is on your knee or on your knees, they are resting or sitting on the upper part of your legs when you are sitting down.

example.ex: He sat with the package on his knees...
example.tran: 他坐着，将包裹放在腿上。

example.ex: I sat in the back of the taxi with my son on my knee.
example.tran: 我坐在出租车后排座上，儿子坐在我腿上。

entry.def: The knee on a piece of clothing is the part that covers your knee.

example.tran: 两个膝部都有洞的牛仔裤

entry.def: If you are on your knees, your legs are bent and your knees are on the ground.

example.ex: She fell to the ground on her knees and prayed...
She was on her knees in the kitchen.

entry.def: If you knee someone, you hit them using your knee.

example.ex: Ian kneed him in the groin.
example.tran: 伊恩用膝盖顶他的下身。

entry.def: If a country or organization is brought to its knees, it is almost completely destroyed by someone or something.

example.ex: The country was being brought to its knees by the loss of 2.4 million manufacturing jobs...
example.tran: 该国因制造业丧失了240万个就业机会而遭到严重打击。

example.ex: Our aim is to bring this government to its knees, to force it to the negotiating table.
example.tran: 我们的目标是使该政府屈服，迫使它走上谈判桌。

auth_sentence.content: We get no Disney-sponsored schlock or weak-kneed Nikita.
auth_sentence.res_content: We get no Disney-sponsored schlock or weak-kneed Nikita.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We get no Disney-sponsored schlock or weak-kneed Nikita.

auth_sentence.content: I kneed him in the groin.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I kneed him in the groin.

auth_sentence.content: He was spindly, knock-kneed, and rapidly losing his carrot-colored hair.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was spindly, knock-kneed, and rapidly losing his carrot-colored hair.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was spindly, knock-kneed, and rapidly losing his carrot-colored hair.
